verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Joys are flowing like a river, Since the Comforter has come; He abides with us forever, Makes the trusting heart His home.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Blessed quietness, holy quietness, What assurance in my soul! On the stormy sea, He speaks peace to me, How the billows cease to roll!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Bringing life and health and gladness, All around this heav'nly Guest, Banished unbelief and sadness, Changed our weariness to rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Like the rain that falls from heaven, Like the sunlight from the sky, So the Holy Ghost is given, Coming on us from on high.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: See, a fruitful field is growing, Blessed fruit of righteousness; And the streams of life are flowing In the lonely wilderness.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: What a wonderful salvation, Where we always see His face! What a peaceful habitation, What a quiet resting-place!
